cam_encryption.body: This app blocks suspicious webcam configurations. <fallback>Learn more</fallback>.

cam_encryption.table_row_1_cell_1_firefox: Camera permissions not remembered in Firefox.
cam_encryption.table_row_2_cell_1: A 3rd-party app is modifying the video.
cam_encryption.table_row_3_cell_1: Hardware not capable of being secured.
cam_encryption.title: Issue Encrypting Camera Feed

auth_full_screen.body: This will start the selfie capture in full screen mode

auth_permission_denied.body_cam: To continue, you must enable camera permissions in your device settings.

auth_retry.subtitle: We weren’t able to capture your face properly

avc_face_capture.title: Turn your head slowly to both sides

avc_intro.disclaimer: Please be mindful that we'll record your face and your background

avc_intro.list_item_two: Then, turn your head slowly to both sides

avc_no_face_detected.list_item_eyes: Make sure your eyes are clearly visible
avc_no_face_detected.list_item_face: Make sure to only show your face, we don’t need to see your ID
avc_no_face_detected.list_item_lighting: Make sure to be in a place with good lighting
avc_no_face_detected.list_item_mask: Make sure to remove masks or other items that cover your face. Eyeglasses are okay
avc_no_face_detected.title: We can't detect your face

poa_alert.country_not_found: Sorry about that. We are working on supporting more countries.

alert.another_doc: Documents from that country are not currently supported — <fallback>try another document type</fallback>

doc_select.button_government_letter_detail: Any government issued letter eg. Benefits entitlement, Voting letters, Tax letters, etc

permission.body_both: We can’t verify you without using both your camera and microphone
permission.body_cam: We can’t verify you without your camera

permission.subtitle_cam: When prompted, you must enable camera access to continue

permission_recovery.subtitle_cam: Recover camera access to continue your verification
